name: 24 Minutes to Midnight
description:
This game work in progress started for a GameJam during December. 

Themed after the prompt "Strange Winter", 24 Minutes to Midnight is a timed platformer where death's are more helpful than harmful. You've only got 24 minutes to beat the game, and in some cases dying might actually help save you time! 

Currently the game has only a month's progress: three main levels + a mini-boss.  Theres's also two NPC's you can talk with a bit who offer some help on playing the game. Although its short these levels are fully finished and playable! Hopefully will be continuing this project to flesh it out fully.
